title: Javier Marias - Novels & Short Stories (10 books)
description:
JAVIER MARÃƒï¿½AS (b. 1951) is a Spanish novelist, translator, and columnist.  He is also the current King of Redonda (see his Wikipedia entry below).  His work has been translated into 34 languages, and more than six million copies of his books have been sold worldwide.  In 1997 he won the Nelly Sachs Award; the Comunidad de Madrid award in 1998; in 2000 the Grinzane Cavour Award, the Alberto Moravia Prize, and the Dublin IMPAC Award.  He also won the Spanish National Translation Award in 1979 for his translation of Tristram Shandy in 1979.

See his biographical entry on Wikipedia: <a href="
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Javier_Mar%C3%ADas" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Javier_Mar%C3%ADas</a>


All the following books are in EPUB format (in varying degrees of quality), with English translations by Margaret Jull Costa unless otherwise indicated:

* A HEART SO WHITE (Harvill, 1995).

* ALL SOULS (Vintage, 2003).

* BAD NATURE, or WITH ELVIS IN MEXICO (New Directions, 2010).  Translated by Esther Allen.

* THE INFATUATIONS (Penguin, 2013).

* THE MAN OF FEELING (New Directions, 2003).

* TOMORROW IN THE BATTLE THINK ON ME (Vintage, 2013).

* WHILE THE WOMEN ARE SLEEPING (Chatto & Windus, 2010).

* YOUR FACE TOMORROW, Vol. 1: Fever and Spear (Vintage, 2005).

* YOUR FACE TOMORROW, Vol. 2: Dance and Dream (Vintage, 2006).

* YOUR FACE TOMORROW, Vol. 3: Poison, Shadow and Farewell (Vintage, 2009).
